Package ch.supertomcat.bh.keywords

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KeywordManagerListener  
    KeywordSearchThreadListener
    Listener for KeywordSearchThreads
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Keyword
    A Keyword is an Object with a title, keywords, absolute DownloadPath, relative DownloadPath and a flag which defines if the absolute or relative path is used.
    KeywordManager
    Class which holds the Keywords
    KeywordSearchThread
    A Thread which searches for Keywords for Title or URLs
